Title: Corrigendum to “Simulation of particulate matter ingress, dispersion and deposition in a historical building” (Journal of Cultural Heritage (2016) 18 (119–208)(S1296207415001375) (10.1016/j.culher.2015.08.006))
Abstract: © 2016The authors regret that in this article published in the March/April issue of 2016, the name of the author Liora Malki-Epshtein was misspelled. It has been corrected above. The authors would like to apologise for any inconvenience caused.
